oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pharmacokinetics of a selemectin and sarolaner topical combination parasiticide in cats
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Collard, Wendy T.
Fielder, Ann E.
Lesman, Steven P.
King, Vickie L.
Merritt, Dawn A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pharmacokinetics
ADME
selamectin
sarolaner
cat
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The selamectin and sarolaner combination is a monthly, topical, broad spectrum parasiticide combining the endectocide and heartworm activity of selamectin with the ectoparasiticide activity of sarolaner for parasite control in cats. The pharmacokinetics and ADME of sarolaner and selamectin were characterized in the cat.
